attributes.action: Curfews and Army to be used against rioters.
attributes.additional_details:
This mindless violence,rioting,arson and thefts is way past the control of the Police.
There should be immediate curfews and military brought in with water-cannon and rubber bullets.
The Judiciary should come down hard on these offenders not give out namby-pamby sentences.
The Governments first job is to defend its' citizens,the law abiding and not the lawless.
